directions: Combine all ingredients in a large pitcher. Stir with a wooden spoon and serve.
Nutritional analysis per serving: 285 calories, 0.2 g fat (0.1 g saturated), 35 g carbs, 1.5 g fiber, 1 g protein
ingredients: 1 cup red or green (or mixed) grapes
1/2 small cucumber, peeled, seeded and diced
title: Springtime Sangria
